cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on March 25, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1464, Saudi Arabia Accountability for Gross Violations of Human Rights Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 38 (Monday, March 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MALINOWSKI:
H.R. 1464.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the Constitution of the
United States
[Page H883]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Saudi Arabia Accountability for Gross Violations of Human Rights Act
